hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Heart Container# and #a Hylian Shield#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Minuet of Forest# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: These hints can be quite useful. This is an exception.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #a Slingshot# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Stone of Agony#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: Space, space, wanna go to space, yes, please space. Space space. Go to space.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #a Hookshot# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.
hinted_locations: LW GS Bean Patch Near Theater

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #2# major items.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path of #gold#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the final prize of #the thieves' training# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Desert Colossus# is a foolish choice.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path of #gold#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #like-like in Ganon's Shadow Trial# guards #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: Have you thought about going where the items are?^Just saying.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Big Poe Bottle# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #a Recovery Heart#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Stone of Agony#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path of #gold#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #chests past Dark Link# in the Water Temple hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that between the #crawl spaces in the Spirit Temple# chests contain...^ #a Huge Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Chest

ToT (Right).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #3# major items.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple Central Bow Target Chest

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path of #gold#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# can be found at #Gerudo's Fortress#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.
